review: This thing is so flippin' fast.  The image quality is better than my satellite, and menus are easy to navigate.  I was set up in a couple of minutes all of my Prime Videos were ready to go.  I don't have the most reliable internet here, but there hasn't been a buffering problem.

review: I love love love this thing. We cut our cable cord and went with Netflix and Hulu. I have been a prime member for years. We were streaming on our tv through our computer. Got this as gift and the video quality is amazing. It plugs directly into the modem though, as It isn't wireless. But I love it. So glad to have it.
